item.title: Don't drop sodium in gasoline
item.description: In this video I take a suggestion from the comments section that asks what would happen if you put sodium in gasoline? It is a curious question that I decided to test out. Since gasoline does absorb moisture form the air there will be a tiny amount of water in regular gasoline. So first I drop a chunk of sodium in regular gasoline to see if get a reaction. Then I drop some in gasoline mixed with water. Finally I drop some in pure water. Watch to see which gave the strongest explosion!

media:content.media:title: Don't drop sodium in gasoline
media:content.media:description: In this video I take a suggestion from the comments section that asks what would happen if you put sodium in gasoline? It is a curious question that I decided to test out. Since gasoline does absorb moisture form the air there will be a tiny amount of water in regular gasoline. So first I drop a chunk of sodium in regular gasoline to see if get a reaction. Then I drop some in gasoline mixed with water. Finally I drop some in pure water. Watch to see which gave the strongest explosion!

item.title: Why do you jump farther while holding weights?
item.description: In this video I test if it is true that you can jump farther while holding weights than without them.

item.title: This is what a real 4D Klein bottle looks like!
item.description: I show you what the difference is between a klein bottle in 4D vs 3D.

media:content.media:title: This is what a real 4D Klein bottle looks like!
media:content.media:description: I show you what the difference is between a klein bottle in 4D vs 3D.

item.title: Eating pure DNA
item.description: In this video I show you how to extract DNA! Then I eat it just to see what it tastes like! I take the DNA out of strawberries, kiwis and even shrimp! This is an amazing experiment that you could do in your own home with simple ingredients. I talk about why the reaction happens and then finally eat all of the DNA at the end!

media:content.media:title: Eating pure DNA
media:content.media:description: In this video I show you how to extract DNA! Then I eat it just to see what it tastes like! I take the DNA out of strawberries, kiwis and even shrimp!
